articles.title: Zuckerberg’s ‘personal superintelligence’ plan: fill your free time with more AI
articles.description: It has been another busy week. GPT-5 appears to be just around the corner… This week, I decode the meaning behind Mark Zuckerberg's "personal superintelligence" manifesto, and what it means for the broader AI race. Keep reading for my chat with a Figma exec on the company's IPO day, a bunch of good links, and […]
articles.author: Alex Heath
